titleStmt.title: The last true and new intelligence from Scotland. Being a true and perfect account of the overthrow of the rebells, with the number of the slain and taken, on both sides. With a list of the names of the chief ring-leaders, and ministers, engaged in this rebellion. Dated June 23, 1679.

notesStmt.note: Relates victory of government forces over covenanting rebels at Battle of Bothwell Bridge and lists names of rebels.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
